title: Games not counting?
body:
Heya Riot! :D

So something strange is happening. I played a game today and afterwards went to check the stats and everything in Launcher. The game wasn't there. No biggie, I've had games taken a while to show up in my Match History before. They usually pop up after I play another game.

I play another game, and the second game I played shows in my Match History, but not the first game. Hmmm, strange. Oh well, maybe the game just didn't count. An error?

So I play a third game, and now that game doesn't appear in my Match History either. I've checked on the website, and it mirrors my Launcher match history, showing only game 2, not game 1 and 3.

So, questions. Is this a known bug? Why does it happen? Did the matches I played count (they seem to have added to my Mastery and IP) and are just not showing, or have they disappeared into the ether? Any answer would be great! :D

replies.body:
So, uhâ€¦ it just did it again. It's seriously only counting like every second game. Just played a super game as Karthus and then go to check my Match History and it's not there. Sad face.

Bump.
It's happened before. All i remember is if you or someone else gets DDOs the game isn't recorded. However this happened to me casually and yeah it just wasn't recorded in my history.

There was a mini-update when I played my Launcher and then when I looked at my match history just now the games all appeared and haven't had the problem since. Hopefully that means they fixed it. I do wish they'd reply on these forums though. No wonder the OCE forums went dead...
